All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.AdjustmentListener, Destructable, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable, Viewer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractTableViewer, IconViewer
public abstract class AbstractViewer
extends ScrollPanel
implements Viewer, Destructable

A class representing a scrolling Viewer

destruct

public void destruct()
Description copied from interface: Destructable
Prepare this object to for garbage collection This method should clear references to other objects and remove any components contained within. It should then mark the object as destructed.
Specified by:
destruct in interface Destructable
